mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMBKUSLOGIN ( I_PEG_NRK, D_BKUS_LOGIN )VALUES( #{namaPengguna}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select count(*) as jumlah from TMBKUSLOGIN where i_peg_nrk = #{namaPengguna} and trunc(sysdate) = trunc(d_bkus_login)
mapper.update: update TRBKUSPENGGUNA set D_PGUN_LASTLOGIN = sysdate, Q_sandi_ERROR = 0 WHERE I_PEG_NRK = #{namaPengguna}
mapper.select: SELECT A.I_Pgun as namaPengguna,crypto16.DECRYPT(A.I_SANDI) as passPengguna, A.C_AKTIF as kodeAktif, 'ROLE_'||A.C_PGUN_GROUP as kodeGrup,A.I_IDSKPD as idSkpd FROM TmPENGGUNA A WHERE A.I_Pgun = #{iPegNrk}

SELECT T.I_ID as idPengguna, T.I_PGUN as namaPengguna, crypto16.DECRYPT(T.I_SANDI) as passPengguna, T.I_IP_ADDRESS as ipAddress, T.C_AKTIF as kodeAktif, T.C_PGUN_GROUP as kodeGrup, S.C_WIL as kodeProses,T.I_IDSKPD as idSkpd FROM TmPENGGUNA T, TRSKPD S WHERE T.I_IDSKPD = S.I_ID AND T.I_PGUN = #{id} AND T.I_IDSKPD IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT T.I_ID as idPengguna, T.I_PGUN as namaPengguna, crypto16.DECRYPT(T.I_SANDI) as passPengguna, T.I_IP_ADDRESS as ipAddress, T.C_AKTIF as kodeAktif, T.C_PGUN_GROUP as kodeGrup, '' as kodeProses,T.I_IDSKPD as idSkpd FROM TMPENGGUNA T WHERE T.I_PGUN = #{id} AND T.I_IDSKPD IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT D.I_MODUL_NO, D.I_ID as id, D.N_MODUL as namaModul, D.N_MODUL_LINK as namaModulLink FROM TRBKUSMODUL A LEFT JOIN TRBKUSPENGGUNAMODUL B ON A.I_ID = B.I_IDMODUL LEFT JOIN TRBKUSPENGGUNA C ON B.I_IDPENGGUNA = C.I_ID ,TRBKUSMODUL D WHERE C.I_PEG_NRK = #{iPegNrk} AND C.I_SANDI = crypto16.ENCRYPT(#{passwd}) AND A.C_AKTIF = '1' AND B.C_AKTIF = '1' AND C.C_AKTIF = '1' AND D.I_ID = A.I_IDINDUK AND D.C_DETAIL = '0' AND D.I_IDINDUK = 1 ORDER BY D.I_MODUL_NO ASC

SELECT DISTINCT D.I_MODUL_NO, D.I_ID as id, D.N_MODUL as namaModul, D.N_MODUL_LINK as namaModulLink FROM TRBKUSMODUL A LEFT JOIN TRBKUSPENGGUNAMODUL B ON A.I_ID = B.I_IDMODUL LEFT JOIN TRBKUSPENGGUNA C ON B.I_IDPENGGUNA = C.I_ID ,TRBKUSMODUL D WHERE C.I_PEG_NRK = #{id} AND A.C_AKTIF = '1' AND B.C_AKTIF = '1' AND C.C_AKTIF = '1' AND D.I_ID = A.I_IDINDUK AND D.C_DETAIL = '0' AND D.I_IDINDUK = 1 ORDER BY D.I_MODUL_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TRBKUSMODUL A WHERE A.I_IDINDUK = #{id} AND A.C_AKTIF = '1'
